extendedInfo.description: If you are Hot Chelle Rae's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Hot Chelle Rae's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Hot Chelle Rae's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Hot Chelle Rae's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - Lovesick Electric- Whatever-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - Alright- Beautiful Freaks- Bleed- Bushes- Downtown Girl- Forever Unstoppable- Honestly- I Like It Like That- I Like To Dance- Keep You With Me- Last One Standing- Never Have I Ever- Nothing Left To Hide- Problematique- Queen Of The Scene- Radio- Say (Half Past Nine)- The Distance- The Only One- Tonight, Tonight- Whatever- Why Don't You Love Me
